CreateAdvancedQueryHistory.title: CreateAdvancedQueryHistory
CreateAdvancedQueryHistory.summary: Creates an advanced query record. It lets you save custom conditional statements for reuse.

CreateTrail.title: CreateTrail
CreateTrail.summary: Creates a trail to deliver events to a destination for long-term storage and analysis, such as an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket, a Simple Log Service (SLS) Logstore, or a MaxCompute project.

DeleteDataEventSelector.title: DeleteDataEventSelector
DeleteDataEventSelector.summary: Deletes the data event selector for a specified trail.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the Alibaba Cloud regions that are supported by ActionTrail.

DescribeResourceLifeCycleEvents.title: DescribeResourceLifeCycleEvents
DescribeResourceLifeCycleEvents.summary: Queries the lifecycle events of a specified resource.

DescribeSearchTemplates.title: DescribeSearchTemplates
DescribeSearchTemplates.summary: Queries advanced query templates for a specified scenario.

DescribeUserAlertCount.title: DescribeUserAlertCount
DescribeUserAlertCount.summary: Queries the number of daily alerts within a specific time range.

DescribeUserLogCount.title: DescribeUserLogCount
DescribeUserLogCount.summary: Queries the number of daily logs within a specific time range.

DisableInsight.title: DisableInsight
DisableInsight.summary: Disables a specific type of insight event.

GetAccessKeyLastUsedEvents.title: GetAccessKeyLastUsedEvents
GetAccessKeyLastUsedEvents.summary: Queries the information about the most recent events that are generated when a specified AccessKey pair is called to access Alibaba Cloud services.

GetAccessKeyLastUsedInfo.title: GetAccessKeyLastUsedInfo
GetAccessKeyLastUsedInfo.summary: Queries the information about the most recent call of a specified AccessKey pair.

GetAccessKeyLastUsedIps.title: GetAccessKeyLastUsedIps
GetAccessKeyLastUsedIps.summary: Queries the information about the IP addresses that are most recently used when an AccessKey pair is called to access Alibaba Cloud services.

GetAccessKeyLastUsedProducts.title: GetAccessKeyLastUsedProducts
GetAccessKeyLastUsedProducts.summary: Queries the information about the Alibaba Cloud services that are most recently accessed by using a specified AccessKey pair.

GetAccessKeyLastUsedResources.title: GetAccessKeyLastUsedResources
GetAccessKeyLastUsedResources.summary: Queries the information about the resources that are most recently accessed by using a specified AccessKey pair.

GetAdvancedQueryTemplate.title: GetAdvancedQueryTemplate
GetAdvancedQueryTemplate.summary: Queries the details about an advanced query template.

GetDataEventSelector.title: GetDataEventSelector
GetDataEventSelector.summary: Queries the details about the data event selector for a specified trail.

GetDeliveryHistoryJob.title: GetDeliveryHistoryJob
GetDeliveryHistoryJob.summary: Queries the details of a data backfill task.

GetGlobalEventsStorageRegion.title: GetGlobalEventsStorageRegion
GetGlobalEventsStorageRegion.summary: Queries the region where global events are stored.

GetGovernanceMetrics.title: GetGovernanceMetrics
GetGovernanceMetrics.summary: Queries the governance metrics of ActionTrail.

GetInsightSelectors.title: GetInsightSelectors
GetInsightSelectors.summary: Retrieves the Insight event types to deliver for a trail.

GetInsightsEventsCount.title: GetInsightsEventsCount
GetInsightsEventsCount.summary: Retrieves the number of Insights events for the current account.

GetTrailStatus.title: GetTrailStatus
GetTrailStatus.summary: Queries the status of a trail.

ListDataEventServices.title: ListDataEventServices
ListDataEventServices.summary: Queries the services that support data events and the names of these events.

ListDeliveryHistoryJobs.title: ListDeliveryHistoryJobs
ListDeliveryHistoryJobs.summary: Queries a list of data backfill tasks.

PutDataEventSelector.title: PutDataEventSelector
PutDataEventSelector.summary: Creates or configures a data event selector. A trail must exist before you create a data event selector. If a trail does not exist, you can call the CreateTrail operation to create one.

PutInsightSelectors.title: PutInsightSelectors
PutInsightSelectors.summary: Specifies the types of Insight events to deliver for a trail.

StartLogging.title: StartLogging
StartLogging.summary: Enables a trail to start delivering ActionTrail events to Object Storage Service (OSS), Simple Log Service (SLS), or MaxCompute.

StopLogging.title: StopLogging
StopLogging.summary: Disables a trail to stop delivering ActionTrail events to Object Storage Service (OSS), Simple Log Service (SLS), or MaxCompute.

UpdateGlobalEventsStorageRegion.title: UpdateGlobalEventsStorageRegion
UpdateGlobalEventsStorageRegion.summary: Specifies the region where you want to store global events.

UpdateTrail.title: UpdateTrail
UpdateTrail.summary: Updates the configurations of a trail.
